sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A plaine and familiar exposition of the ninth and tenth chapters of the Prouerbs of Salomon Dod, John, 1549?-1645. Cleaver, Robert, 1561 or 2-ca. 1625. aut
[8], 120 p.
Printed by T[homas] E[ast] for Thomas Man, dwelling in Paternoster-Row at the signe of the Talbot, London : 1606.
Dedication signed: Iohn Dod, Robert Cleauer. Printer's name from STC. The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A". Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======
